mapper.sql: SELECT RIFOBT.OBLIGOR_CODE, RIFOBT.BRIEF_DESC_ENG, RIFOBT.LONG_DESC_ENG, RIFOBT.BRIEF_DESC_ARAB, RIFOBT.LONG_DESC_ARAB, RIFOBT.ADDITIONAL_REFERENCE FROM RIFOBT WHERE RIFOBT.COMP_CODE = #{compCode}

SELECT RIFOBT_TRENDS_DET.COMP_CODE, RIFOBT_TRENDS_DET.OBLIGOR_CODE, RIFOBT_TRENDS_DET.LINE_NO, RIFOBT_TRENDS_DET.CTSTRX_TYPE, ( SELECT
CTSTRXTYPE.SHORT_DESC_ARAB
CTSTRXTYPE.SHORT_DESC_ENG
FROM CTSTRXTYPE WHERE CODE = RIFOBT_TRENDS_DET.CTSTRX_TYPE AND COMP_CODE = #{compCode,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )AS CTSTRXTYPE_DESC, RIFOBT_TRENDS_DET.PERIODICITY_TYPE AS PERIODICITY_CODE, (SELECT SYS_PARAM_LOV_TRANS.VALUE_DESC FROM SYS_PARAM_LOV_TRANS WHERE SYS_PARAM_LOV_TRANS.VALUE_CODE = RIFOBT_TRENDS_DET.PERIODICITY_TYPE AND SYS_PARAM_LOV_TRANS.LOV_TYPE_ID = #{lovTypeId} AND SYS_PARAM_LOV_TRANS.LANG_CODE = #{language} ) AS PERIODICITY_TYPE, (SELECT CURRENCIES.DECIMAL_POINTS FROM CURRENCIES,RIFCRT WHERE CURRENCIES.COMP_CODE = RIFCRT.COMP_CODE AND CURRENCIES.CURRENCY_CODE = RIFCRT.CURRENCY_CODE AND CURRENCIES.COMP_CODE = #{compCode,jdbcType=NUMERIC})CURRENCIES_DECIMAL_POINTS, RIFOBT_TRENDS_DET.PERIODICITY, RIFOBT_TRENDS_DET.SINGLE_TRX_AMT, RIFOBT_TRENDS_DET.TOTAL_TRX_AMT FROM RIFOBT_TRENDS_DET WHERE RIFOBT_TRENDS_DET.COMP_CODE = #{compCode,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND RIFOBT_TRENDS_DET.OBLIGOR_CODE = #{oneObligorCode,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT RIFOBT.COMP_CODE, RIFOBT.OBLIGOR_CODE, RIFOBT.BRIEF_DESC_ENG, RIFOBT.BRIEF_DESC_ARAB, RIFOBT.LONG_DESC_ENG, RIFOBT.LONG_DESC_ARAB, RIFOBT.LIMIT, RIFOBT.ADDITIONAL_REFERENCE, RIFOBT.ML_GROSS_AMOUNT, RIFOBT.CREDIT_RATING, (SELECT CURRENCIES.CURRENCY_CODE FROM CURRENCIES,RIFCRT WHERE CURRENCIES.COMP_CODE = RIFCRT.COMP_CODE AND CURRENCIES.CURRENCY_CODE = RIFCRT.CURRENCY_CODE AND CURRENCIES.COMP_CODE = #{compCode,jdbcType=NUMERIC})CURRENCY_CODE, (SELECT CURRENCIES.BRIEF_DESC_ENG FROM CURRENCIES,RIFCRT WHERE CURRENCIES.COMP_CODE = RIFCRT.COMP_CODE AND CURRENCIES.CURRENCY_CODE = RIFCRT.CURRENCY_CODE AND CURRENCIES.COMP_CODE = #{compCode,jdbcType=NUMERIC})CURRENCIES_DESC, (SELECT CURRENCIES.DECIMAL_POINTS FROM CURRENCIES,RIFCRT WHERE CURRENCIES.COMP_CODE = RIFCRT.COMP_CODE AND CURRENCIES.CURRENCY_CODE = RIFCRT.CURRENCY_CODE AND CURRENCIES.COMP_CODE = #{compCode,jdbcType=NUMERIC})CURRENCIES_DECIMAL_POINTS, (SELECT CREDIT_RATING.BRIEF_NAME_ENG FROM CREDIT_RATING WHERE CREDIT_RATING.COMP_CODE = #{compCode,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CREDIT_RATING.CODE = RIFOBT.CREDIT_RATING)RATING_DESC, RIFOBT.PROFILE, (SELECT CIF_PROFILE.BRIEF_NAME_ENG FROM CIF_PROFILE WHERE CIF_PROFILE.COMP_CODE = #{compCode,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CIF_PROFILE.CODE = RIFOBT.PROFILE)PROFILE_DESC, RIFOBT.COMENT FROM RIFOBT , CIF WHERE RIFOBT.OBLIGOR_CODE = CIF.ONE_OBLIGOR AND RIFOBT.COMP_CODE = CIF.COMP_CODE AND CIF.COMP_CODE = #{compCode,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CIF.CIF_NO = #{cifNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT TRSCLASS.CODE, TRSCLASS.CATEGORY, TRSCLASS.BRIEF_NAME_ENG, TRSCLASS.BRIEF_NAME_ARAB, TRSCLASS.LONG_NAME_ENG, TRSCLASS.EXPOSURE_LIMIT, TRSCLASS.LEASE_TYPE, TRSCLASS.PREFIX, TRSCLASS.SETTLEMENT_DIVISION, TRSCATEGORY.APP_NAME FROM TRSCLASS, TRSCATEGORY WHERE (TRSCLASS.COMP_CODE = #{compCode}) and (TRSCLASS.CATEGORY = TRSCATEGORY.CATEGORY_CODE)AND (CASE WHEN TRSCLASS.APP_NAME IS NULL THEN #{currAppName} ELSE TRSCLASS.APP_NAME END = #{currAppName}) AND (TRSCATEGORY.APP_NAME =#{currAppName} )
